metadata.synopsis: Dolor waits at the door to the Murder Tribunal's courtroom in front of the Death Knight, frustrated at a new rival that is seeking out the Murder Tribunal to become an Unholy Assassin.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use "oe MT_Start", enter the tombstone shop and go down into the Murder Tribunal- Use "oe MT_Dolor 1" to get Dolor to appear at the Death Knight guarding the courtroom.- In his idle behaviours, Dolor will do this AD every now and then.

0.speaker: Meztli
0.text: Perhaps I erred... No, my victims were all from the list. I am right. I am owed.

1.speaker: Meztli
1.text: Let me pass. I have paid my dues - I will stand before the Tribunal. I must.

2.speaker: Meztli
2.text: Am I to beg? To plead? To debase myself, wraith? Speak, damn you!

3.speaker: Meztli
3.text: I spoke the damned passphrase, brought the bloody hands - let me in!
